faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.section.0.title: Getting Started
faq.section.0.q0.question: What is AI Dev Request Platform?
faq.section.0.q0.answer: AI Dev Request Platform is an AI-powered development platform that enables you to build software using natural language. Simply describe what you want to build, and our AI (powered by Claude) will analyze your requirements, propose a solution, and generate production-ready code.
faq.section.0.q1.question: How do I get started?
faq.section.0.q1.step1: Crear a free account using email or OAuth (Google/GitHub)
faq.section.0.q1.step2: Describe your project in natural language
faq.section.0.q1.step3: Review the AI-generated proposal and technical specifications
faq.section.0.q1.step4: Aprobar the plan and let AI generate your code
faq.section.0.q1.step5: Desplegar your project to the cloud with one click
faq.section.0.q2.question: Do I need coding experience?
faq.section.0.q2.answer: No coding experience is required to use the platform! However, developers can benefit from advanced features like code review, refinement, and custom specifications. The platform is designed for both technical and non-technical usuarios.
faq.section.0.q3.question: What types of proyectos can I build?
faq.section.0.q3.answer: You can build web applications (React, Vue, Angular), backend APIs (.NET, Node.js), mobile apps, landing pages, admin dashboards, and more. The platform supports multiple frameworks and technology stacks.
faq.section.1.title: Precios and Billing
faq.section.1.q0.question: How does pricing work?
faq.section.1.q0.answer: We use a credit-based system. Cr√©ditos are consumed when generating code, deploying proyectos, and using advanced features. You can purchase credit packages or subscribe to monthly plans with included cr√©ditos. Check our pricing page for current rates.
faq.section.1.q1.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.section.1.q1.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and debit cards through Stripe. Cryptocurrency payments may be available for enterprise plans.
faq.section.1.q2.question: Can I get a refund?
faq.section.1.q2.answer: Cr√©ditos are generally non-refundable. However, we may issue refunds in cases of service outages, billing errores, or at our discretion. Contacto support@aidevrequest.com for refund solicitudes.
faq.section.1.q3.question: Do unused cr√©ditos expire?
faq.section.1.q3.answer: Credit expiration depends on your plan. One-time credit purchases typically expire after 12 months of inactivity, while subscription plans include monthly cr√©ditos that reset each billing cycle.
faq.section.2.title: AI and C√≥digo Generation
faq.section.2.q0.question: Which AI models do you use?
faq.section.2.q0.answer: We primarily use Anthropic Claude API (Claude Opus 4.6 and Sonnet 4.5). Our intelligent model routing system automatically selects the best model for your task, balancing quality, speed, and cost.
faq.section.2.q1.question: How accurate is the AI-generated code?
faq.section.2.q1.answer: Our AI generates production-quality code with built-in best practices, security scanning, and automated testing. However, we recommend reviewing generated code before deployment. We also offer AI code review and self-healing features to catch and fix problemas.
faq.section.2.q2.question: Can I modify the generated code?
faq.section.2.q2.answer: Yes! You own the generated code and can modify it freely. The platform supports iterative refinement where you can request changes in natural language, and incremental code regeneration to preserve your custom modifications.
faq.section.2.q3.question: What if the AI makes a mistake?
faq.section.2.q3.answer: Our platform includes compiler validation, automated testing, and self-healing capabilities to catch errores. If you find an issue, you can use the refinement feature to request corrections, or contact support for assistance.
faq.section.3.title: Deployment and Hosting
faq.section.3.q0.question: Where are proyectos hosted?
faq.section.3.q0.answer: Proyectos are deployed to Microsoft Azure using Container Apps and Static Web Apps. We provide automatic scaling, HTTPS, and global CDN for optimal performance.
faq.section.3.q1.question: Can I use my own domain?
faq.section.3.q1.answer: Yes! You can connect custom domains to your deployed proyectos. Domain management and SSL certificates are handled automatically through the platform.
faq.section.3.q2.question: What hosting plans are available?
faq.section.3.q2.answer: We offer Gratis, Starter, Pro, and Enterprise hosting plans with varying resource limits, bandwidth, and features. Todos plans include automatic scaling and HTTPS.
faq.section.3.q3.question: Can I export my code and host elsewhere?
faq.section.3.q3.answer: Absolutely! You can export your generated code at any time and deploy it to your own infrastructure. We provide Docker containerization for easy deployment to any cloud provider.
faq.section.4.title: Security and Privacy
faq.section.4.q0.question: Is my code and data secure?
faq.section.4.q0.answer: Yes. We implement industry-standard security practices including encryption at rest and in transit, regular security audits, secret detection, and OAuth compliance. Your data is stored in secure Azure data centers.
faq.section.4.q1.question: Who owns the generated code?
faq.section.4.q1.answer: You retain full ownership of all code generated through your solicitudes. We do not claim any intellectual property rights to your proyectos.
faq.section.4.q2.question: Do you use my code to train AI models?
faq.section.4.q2.answer: We may use anonymized, aggregated data to improve our platform, but we do not use your proprietary code or personally identifiable information for training without explicit consent. You can opt out of data collection by contacting us.
faq.section.4.q3.question: Are you GDPR and CCPA compliant?
faq.section.4.q3.answer: Yes, we comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other data protection regulations. You can exercise your rights to access, correct, or delete your data through your account settings or by contacting privacy@aidevrequest.com.
faq.section.5.title: Features and Integrations
faq.section.5.q0.question: Can I integrate with GitHub?
faq.section.5.q0.answer: Yes! We support bidirectional GitHub sync, allowing you to push generated code to GitHub repositories and pull changes back to the platform. Each development request can create a separate git branch.
faq.section.5.q1.question: Do you support team collaboration?
faq.section.5.q1.answer: Yes, we offer team workspaces with collaborative editing (CRDT), shared proyectos, and role-based access control. Contacto us for team and enterprise plans.
faq.section.5.q2.question: Can I import designs from Figma?
faq.section.5.q2.answer: Yes! Our Figma import feature can convert Figma designs directly into React componentes with accurate styling and layout.
faq.section.5.q3.question: What testing features are available?
faq.section.5.q3.answer: We provide AI-powered test generation (unit, integration, and E2E tests with Playwright), visual regression testing, and self-healing tests that automatically update when your UI changes.
faq.section.6.title: Soporte and Troubleshooting
faq.section.6.q0.question: How do I get help?
faq.section.6.q0.channel3: Documentation: Built-in help articles and guides
faq.section.6.q0.channel4: Community: Feature suggestions and discussion forums
faq.section.6.q1.question: What are your support horas?
faq.section.6.q1.answer: Correo electr√≥nico support is available 24/7 with response times of 24-48 horas for standard plans. Pro and Enterprise plans receive priority support with faster response times.
faq.section.6.q2.question: My project build fall√≥. What should I do?
faq.section.6.q2.answer: Check the build logs in your project detail page for error mensajes. Our self-healing system may automatically fix common problemas. You can also use the refinement feature to request fixes or contact support with your project ID.
faq.section.6.q3.question: How do I report a bug?
faq.section.6.q3.answer: Please report bugs through our Soporte Board or email support@aidevrequest.com with details including pasos to reproduce, expected vs actual behavior, and any error mensajes.
faq.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At AI Dev Request Platform, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform and services.
privacy.s1.title: 1. Information We Collect
privacy.s1.sub1.title: 1.1 Information You Provide
privacy.s1.sub1.item1Text: Nombre, email address, password, and profile details
privacy.s1.sub1.item2Text: Billing address and payment method details (processed securely through Stripe)
privacy.s1.sub1.item3Text: Natural language prompts, code requirements, and project specifications
privacy.s1.sub1.item4Text: C√≥digo, configurations, and archivos created through our platform
privacy.s1.sub1.item5Text: Messages sent through support channels or feedback forms
privacy.s1.sub2.title: 1.2 Automatically Collected Information
privacy.s1.sub2.item1Text: Features used, solicitudes submitted, generation history, and platform interactions
privacy.s1.sub2.item2Text: IP address, browser type, device information, operating system
privacy.s1.sub2.item3Text: Page views, session duration, feature usage patterns
privacy.s1.sub2.item4Text: API response times, error logs, system performance metrics
privacy.s1.sub3.title: 1.3 OAuth and Social Authentication
privacy.s1.sub3.p1: When you authenticate via Google or GitHub, we receive basic profile information including your name, email address, and profile picture as permitted by the OAuth provider.
privacy.s2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
privacy.s2.intro: We use your information for the following purposes:
privacy.s2.item1Text: Process development solicitudes, generate code, and deploy proyectos
privacy.s2.item2Text: Crear and maintain your account, authenticate usuarios
privacy.s2.item3Text: Process transactions, manage subscriptions, and track credit usage
privacy.s2.item4Text: Analizar usage patterns to enhance features and performance
privacy.s2.item5Text: Improve AI models and code generation quality (see Section 3)
privacy.s2.item6Text: Detect fraud, prevent abuse, and protect platform integrity
privacy.s2.item7Text: Enviar service updates, security alerts, and marketing mensajes (with consent)
privacy.s2.item8Text: Comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service
privacy.s3.title: 3. AI Training and Generated Content
privacy.s3.claudeText: We use Anthropic's Claude API for code generation. Your prompts and generated code may be processed by Anthropic's systems. Please review
privacy.s3.claudeTextAfter: for details on their data practices.
privacy.s3.trainingText: We may use anonymized and aggregated data from development solicitudes to improve our AI models and platform features. We do not use personally identifiable information or proprietary code for training without explicit consent.
privacy.s3.optOutText: You can opt out of having your data used for model training by contacting us at privacy@aidevrequest.com.
privacy.s4.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
privacy.s4.intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacy.s4.item1Text: Third-party services including Anthropic (Claude API), Stripe (payments), Azure (hosting), and analytics providers
privacy.s4.item2Text: When required by law, legal process, or government request
privacy.s4.item3Text: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales
privacy.s4.item4Text: When you explicitly authorize us to share information
privacy.s4.item5Text: Information you choose to make public (e.g., marketplace templates)
privacy.s4.noSell: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.s5.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
privacy.s5.storageText: Your data is stored on secure servers hosted by Microsoft Azure, with primary data centers in the Asia-Pacific region.
privacy.s5.databaseText: We use PostgreSQL with encryption at rest. Vector embeddings for semantic search are stored using pgvector with HNSW indexing.
privacy.s5.securityText: We implement industry-standard security practices including:
privacy.s5.measure1: Encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS) and at rest
privacy.s5.measure2: Regular security audits and vulnerability scanning
privacy.s5.measure4: Secure credential storage with JWT tokens
privacy.s5.measure5: Secret detection to prevent credential leaks in generated code
privacy.s5.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security of your data.
privacy.s6.title: 6. Data Retention
privacy.s6.intro: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. Specific retention periods:
privacy.s6.item1Text: Retained until account deletion, then anonymized after 90 d√≠as
privacy.s6.item2Text: Retained according to your project settings and storage plan
privacy.s6.item3Text: Retained for 12 months for analytics and debugging
privacy.s6.item4Text: Retained for 7 years to comply with financial regulations
privacy.s7.title: 7. Your Privacy Rights
privacy.s7.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
privacy.s7.item1Text: Request a copy of your personal data
privacy.s7.item3Text: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy.s7.item4Text: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
privacy.s7.item5Text: Object to processing of your personal data
privacy.s7.exerciseRights: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@aidevrequest.com or through your account settings.
privacy.s8.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
privacy.s8.intro: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to maintain sesiones, remember preferences, and analyze platform usage. Types of cookies we use:
privacy.s8.item1Text: Requerido for authentication and platform functionality
privacy.s8.item2Text: Help us understand how usuarios interact with the platform
privacy.s8.control: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings, though this may affect platform functionality.
privacy.s9.title: 9. Children's Privacy
privacy.s9.p1: Our platform is not intended for usuarios under 13 years of age (or 16 in the European Economic Area). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.
privacy.s10.title: 10. International Data Transfers
privacy.s10.p1: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international transfers, including Standard Contractual Clauses where applicable.
privacy.s11.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
privacy.s11.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes via email or platform notification. The "Last Updated" date at the top indicates when the policy was last revised.
privacy.s12.title: 12. Contacto Information
privacy.s12.intro: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at:
